skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: {"id": "0ca436ac-b7b0-4c76-91d7-6d50bf498b46", "value": "Gebouwen voor openbare christelijke erediensten die historisch worden onderscheiden van kapellen en oratoria, dat gebouwen zijn die in enig opzicht priv\u00e9, of in de ruimste zin, niet publiek, zijn. Kerkarchitectuur volgt in het algemeen standaard modellen, die vari\u00ebren afhankelijk van de datum, locatie en de kenmerken van de gemeente."}

{"id": "54b8b2c7-8d39-4192-8dcc-d19ca9dba1f9", "value": "Edif\u00edcios para o culto crist\u00e3o p\u00fablico que se distinguem historicamente de capelas e orat\u00f3rios, que s\u00e3o edif\u00edcios que s\u00e3o em algum aspecto privados, ou n\u00e3o p\u00fablicos no sentido mais amplo. A arquitetura da igreja geralmente segue modelos padr\u00e3o, que variam dependendo da data, localiza\u00e7\u00e3o e caracter\u00edsticas da congrega\u00e7\u00e3o."}

{"id": "e12d89da-85af-44d9-95f8-0a58c2b822ea", "value": "Geb\u00e4ude f\u00fcr \u00f6ffentlichen christlichen Gottesdienst, das historisch von Kapellen und Oratorien unterschieden wird, die in mancher Hinsicht private Geb\u00e4ude oder im weitesten Sinn nicht \u00f6ffentlich sind. Die Kirchenarchitektur folgt allgemein weitgehend standardisierten Bauformen, die abh\u00e4ngig von Zeit, Ort und Eigenschaften der Kirchengemeinde variieren k\u00f6nnen. \t\t\t\r\n"}

{"id": "3a63b2bf-ae47-4dd4-8303-987b00ffa8c5", "value": "Buildings for public Christian worship that are distinguished historically from chapels and oratories, which are buildings that are in some respect private, or not public in the widest sense. Church architecture generally somewhat follows standard models, which vary depending upon the date, location, and characteristics of the congregation."}

{"id": "32461308-da81-465b-944a-a332ffa4efd8", "value": "Built complexes for religious retirement or seclusion from the world for monks, who are people living a celibate life according to the rule of a particular religious order and adhering to vows, especially of poverty, chastity, and obedience."}

{"id": "bb05b9aa-cb09-4cef-9030-dcddcbc93600", "value": "Bauanlage zum religi\u00f6sen R\u00fcckzug oder zur Absonderung von der Welt f\u00fcr M\u00f6nche, d. h. Personen, die ein z\u00f6libat\u00e4res Leben nach der Regel eines bestimmten religi\u00f6sen Ordens leben und Gel\u00fcbde beachten, besonders die der Armut, Keuschheit und des Gehorsams."}

{"id": "a37f80e4-68d0-4b5d-918e-33eefcbdcae7", "value": "Construiu cosntru\u00eddos omplexos para aposentadoria religiosa ou reclus\u00e3o do mundo para monges, que s\u00e3o pessoas que vivem uma vida celibat\u00e1ria de acordo com a regra de uma ordem religiosa particular e aderem a votos, especialmente de pobreza, castidade e obedi\u00eancia"}
{"id": "58375d6f-eea8-4620-a7cf-6e4cbe2e0be1", "value": "Plaatsen van religieuze retraite of afzondering van de wereld voor mensen die religieuze geloften hebben afgelegd."}
